subject: Baseball
Bankruptcies
lead_paragraph: Lenny Dykstra, a former outfielder for the Mets and the Philadelphia Phillies, cited more than $31 million in debts while filing for Chapter 11 status.
snippet: Lenny Dykstra, a former outfielder for the Mets and the Philadelphia Phillies, cited more than $31 million in debts while filing for Chapter 11 status.
